name: Chart the Stars
description:
Chart the Stars!

... with Unexpected Guests

Get your crew and their new guests home to Earth! A worker-placement game with unique interactions and a heart of gold.

  • Chart the Stars to Find your way Home - Earth
  • Keep your Crew alive and healthy by meeting their Needs
  • Balance the needs of your Ship, your Humans, and your Aliens
  • Assign your Crew to perform Jobs and discover what happens when they are JOINED TOGETHER
  • Deal with unique interactions that ever-evolve the state of the Ship

This is a submission for the GMTK-2021 Game Jam. I appreciate your interest in my game!
